name: tasit-action
description: A library for using Ethereum smart contracts that abstracts away the low-level blockchain-related details so that developers can focus on the core business logic for their app
author: Tasit Labs

scripts.prepare: rm -rf dist/* && npx babel src --out-dir dist --ignore src/*.test.js,src/**/*.test.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npx mocha "src/**/*.test.js" --recursive --require @babel/register --file src/testHelpers/mochaSetup.js
